name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience leveraging expertise in **Python**, **CI/CD**, **AWS**, **Azure DevOps**, and **API development** to build high-performance solutions. Proficient in modern development and operational practices with a deep understanding of **Microservices**, **Automated Testing**, and **Infrastructure as Code** utilizing tools like **Terraform**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**. Adept at employing **FastAPI** for efficient API development and integration into robust systems.

Skilled in orchestrating CI/CD pipelines, improving development workflows, and fostering collaboration among development and operations teams. I have successfully led the adoption of advanced tools such as **Airflow**, **Databricks**, and **Argo**, aligning with best practices to drive efficiency and maintain compliance with industry standards. My background also includes a strong foundation in enterprise-grade systems, with a focus on secure deployment and compliance with HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
